course.subject: FINA
course.name: Risk Management for Financial Institutions
course.description: Brief overview of financial intermediaries and their functions.  Measures of interest rate risk: periodic (re-pricing) gap, duration gap.  Management of interest rate risk using appropriate composition of assets and liabilities, futures, options, caps, floors, collars, swaps.  Market risk: value at risk measures.  Management of credit risk, off-balance sheet risk, liquidity risk, capital adequacy.  Deposit insurance.  With selected case studies.
course.prerequisites: FINA 5120 or FINA 5210
